text:
Blank lines in the log output have doubled since version 1.5.3-1. I included 
the simplest example that I could below. I added line numbers (#:) so that the 
blank space didn't get lost when entering this issue.

---
$ export ANT_HOME=/usr/bin/apache-ant-1.5.3-1
$ ant -q
1:
2:BUILD SUCCESSFUL
3:Total time: 1 second
$ export ANT_HOME=/usr/bin/apache-ant-1.6.1
$ ant -q
1:
2:
3:
4:
5:
6:
7:
8:BUILD SUCCESSFUL
9:Total time: 2 seconds
$
creator: kurt.devlin@thomson.com
mbenson@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27546 ***
